comments.content:
Which is the Bitstream copy of Excelsior, a Linotype face from 1931.  
 [http://www.linotype.com/de/387/Excelsior-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022084924/http:/www.linotype.com/de/387/Excelsior-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/de/387/Excelsior-family.html")
